languages.text: Это единственный путь на мостик, где скрывается от правосудия капитан Саргона, и точка сбора с союзниками. Арбитры берут на себя самую опасную часть пути — им пригодится любая поддержка, которую может оказать Вольный Торговец.

traits.locale_text: Это единственный путь на мостик, где скрывается от правосудия капитан Саргона.

languages.text: Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.
languages.original_text: Это единственный путь на мостик, где скрывается от правосудия капитан Саргона, и точка сбора с союзниками. Арбитры берут на себя самую опасную часть пути — им пригодится любая поддержка, которую может оказать Вольный Торговец.

traits.locale_text: Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice — and it is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.
That's the only path to the bridge where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice.

Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice — and it is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

languages.text: キャプテン・サルゴナが正義の手から逃れて隠れているブリッジへ行くには、エレベーターを使うしかない。また、そこは乗り込み部隊の合流地点でもある。アービトレイターたちは、進軍の中でも最も危険な区間を自ら引き受けている。ローグトレーダーが提供できるどんな支援でも感謝されるだろう。
languages.original_text: Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

traits.locale_text: キャプテン・サルゴナが正義の手から逃れて隠れているブリッジへ行くには、エレベーターを使うしかない。また、そこは乗り込み部隊の合流地点でもある。アービトレイターたちは、進軍の中でも最も危険な区間を自ら引き受けている。ローグトレーダーが提供できるどんな支援でも感謝されるだろう。

languages.text: Der Aufzug ist der einzige Weg auf die Brücke, auf der sich Kapitän Sargona vor der Gerechtigkeit versteckt. Außerdem treffen sich dort die Entertrupps. Die Arbitratoren haben den gefährlichsten Teil des Abenteuers auf sich genommen und würden sich über jede Unterstützung seitens {rt_mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} freuen.
languages.original_text: Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufzug ist der einzige Weg auf die Brücke, auf der sich Kapitän Sargona vor der Gerechtigkeit versteckt. Außerdem treffen sich dort die Entertrupps. Die Arbitratoren haben den gefährlichsten Teil des Abenteuers auf sich genommen und würden sich über jede Unterstützung seitens {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} freuen.

languages.text: Pour atteindre le pont et retrouver le capitaine Sargona qui tente de se dérober à la justice, vous devez emprunter l'ascenseur. Il s'agit également du point de rendez-vous des équipes d'abordage. Les arbitrators se sont chargés de la partie la plus dangereuse de l'assaut et apprécieront donc tout soutien que {rt_mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pourra leur apporter.
languages.original_text: Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

traits.locale_text: Pour atteindre le pont et retrouver le capitaine Sargona qui tente de se dérober à la justice, vous devez emprunter l'ascenseur. Il s'agit également du point de rendez-vous des équipes d'abordage. Les arbitrators se sont chargés de la partie la plus dangereuse de l'assaut et apprécieront donc tout soutien que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pourra leur apporter.

languages.text: El ascensor es el único modo de llegar al puente, donde el capitán Sargona se oculta de la justicia. También es el punto de reunión de los equipos de abordaje. Los Arbitrator se están ocupando de la parte más peligrosa del ataque, así que agradecerán cualquier apoyo que pueda proporcionarles el Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

traits.locale_text: El ascensor es el único modo de llegar al puente, donde el capitán Sargona se oculta de la justicia. También es el punto de reunión de los equipos de abordaje. Los Arbitrator se están ocupando de la parte más peligrosa del ataque, así que agradecerán cualquier apoyo que pueda proporcionarles el Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: 行商浪人必须乘坐电梯才能前往舰桥。萨戈纳舰长正躲在那里，自以为能逃脱正义的审判。此外，那里也是登舰部队的汇合点。法务官的队伍负责处理整场行动中最危险的区域，如果行商浪人能提供额外支援，他们会非常感激。
languages.original_text: Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人必须乘坐电梯才能前往舰桥。萨戈纳舰长正躲在那里，自以为能逃脱正义的审判。此外，那里也是登舰部队的汇合点。法务官的队伍负责处理整场行动中最危险的区域，如果行商浪人能提供额外支援，他们会非常感激。

languages.text: Kaptan Sargona'nın adaletten saklandığı köprüye ulaşmanın tek yolu asansöre binmek. Asansör, aynı zamanda bordalama ekiplerinin buluşma noktası. Yargıcılar, görevin en tehlikeli kısmını üstlendiğinden Hür Tacir'in sağlayabileceği her türlü desteği memnuniyetle karşılayacaktır.
languages.original_text: Taking the elevator is the only way to reach the bridge, where Captain Sargona is hiding from justice. It is also the rendezvous point for the boarding teams. The Arbitrators have taken the most dangerous stretch of the advance upon themselves, so they would appreciate any support the Rogue Trader is able to provide.

traits.locale_text: Kaptan Sargona'nın adaletten saklandığı köprüye ulaşmanın tek yolu asansöre binmek. Asansör, aynı zamanda bordalama ekiplerinin buluşma noktası. Yargıcılar, görevin en tehlikeli kısmını üstlendiğinden Hür Tacir'in sağlayabileceği her türlü desteği memnuniyetle karşılayacaktır.
